title: Kwik Goal Magnetic Dry Erase Board
features: Includes: Player I.D. Magnets with Insert Cards; Training Session Planner and Dry Erase Pen
Put players names in I.D magnets
Play game or practice sessions on paper
description: The MB-3 Magnetic Dry Erase Board is an all-encompassing coaching board. A Coach can quickly diagram tactics to players with either the dry erase pen or the Player I.D. Magnets, which include inserts for players names. A Training Session Planner and paper clip are also included for more notes.
